duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform patient record and transcription activities using computer software proficiently.
Demonstrate effective communication skills (verbal, non-verbal and written).
Manage concerns in a courteous and professional manner.
Maintain confidentiality of patient, employee and departmental information.
Order, stock and organize adequate and appropriate supplies.
Handle all trash, regulated medical waste, and soiled linens within the department.

education_certification.credential: American Heart Association BLS or CPR through American Red Cross (within 7 days of hire)
